greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of sin(x)*exp(sin(x)).
formula: a(n) = D^n(x*exp(x)) evaluated at x = 0, where D is the operator sqrt(1-x^2)*d/dx. Cf. A009623. - _Peter Bala_, Dec 06 2011
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
ext: Extended with signs by _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 15 1997
